install.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{prefix}blog_entries` ( `id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` tinytext NOT NULL, `alias` varchar(155) NOT NULL, `body` text NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, `image` tinytext NOT NULL, `status` enum('inactive','active') NOT NULL default 'inactive', `lang` char(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `LANGUAGE` (`lang`), FULLTEXT KEY `SEARCH` (`title`, `body`) ) {mysql_version};
